about_the_game:
Card Attack is a collectible card-based roguelike game.

In Card Attack, there are 54 unique cards. However, you won't start with all of them. Your journey begins with just 10 cards in your deck.

Even if your initial cards seem weak, don’t worry—take on battles and push forward!

As you progress through your adventure, you’ll earn additional cards as rewards. By building up your collection of reward cards, you'll soon discover the powerful 'Gabee' character waiting to join your team!

HOW TO PLAY:

Attacking with Cards:

Combat is turn-based. Take your time to observe your opponent's stamina and strike using your powerful red attack cards!

Defending with Cards:

Double-click on a defense card to equip its armor, reducing the damage from enemy attacks to a minimum.

Upgrade with Equipment/Relics:

Enhance, reset, recover, or weaken—use your skill cards to deal devastating critical hits to your enemies.

Card Acquisition (Draws):

Every time you defeat a monster, you'll earn additional cards as rewards. Cards are suggested randomly. Choose the one that best fits your strategy!

Camping (Recovery):

Stop by the camp before battles to restore your health. Use the gold you've collected to recharge and prepare for the fight ahead!

Shop (Upgrades):

After every five stages, you'll encounter a shop. Don’t skip it! Use the opportunity to remove unnecessary cards, purchase new ones, and acquire valuable relics. With every upgrade, you'll grow stronger, paving the way to complete Season 1 with ease!

Demo Content:

Experience stages 1 to 10, culminating in the thrilling first boss battle.

Defeat the boss and feel the electrifying excitement of Card Attack!
